fields.name: Sheeple (Passive):
fields.value: Appear as a role of your choice to investigations. Hitting 30% or more standard deviation any evening will allow investigations to read you as your actual role that night. Conversely, If your standard deviation is less than 10%, your defense power boosts to 2.0x that night.

fields.name: Insurance:
fields.value: Discount another alchemist a percentage of the factional poison charge, taken from your score last evening. This can be multitasked, other abilities using the remainder of your score. This doesnâ€™t deduct from the charges of your abilities.

fields.name: Recall (1x, 225%):
fields.value: Take away a non-passive ability of any other alchemist. Replace it with any ability of any alchemist role with equal conditions (Locked for Locked, Locked with charge for Locked with charge, Non-restockable for non-restockable, etc.,).

fields.name: Supplement (1x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlock by placing in the top 3. Give yourself any non-passive, non-locked alchemist ability. Cannot be restocked by any means.

fields.name: Red Tape (0x, 100%):
fields.value: Delay the effect of a random protective ability used tonight until tomorrow night.
